name: flashlight
description: Hand-held portable battery operated light source. It is powered by two D size batteries

name: crowbar
description: A metal bar with a single curved end and flattened points, often with a small fissure on one or both ends for removing nails or to force apart two objects.

name: hammer
description: A hand tool, consisting of a weighted head fixed to a long handle that is swung to deliver an impact to a small area of an object.

name: battery
description: A dry cell that is cylindrical in shape with electrical contacts at both ends. D cells were originally known as flashlight batteries.

name: cellphone
description: A portable telephone that can make and receive calls over a radio frequency link while the user is moving within a telephone service area
